amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to survey, assess, or review potential detention locations in the United States to detain any individual presently detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit the use of funds to survey, assess, or review potential detention locations in the United States to detain any individual presently detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 245 - 175 (Roll no. 319).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 245 - 175 (Roll no. 319).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
